Reviews.Title: Lack of support after purchase
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I purchased a similar HD-SDI DVR from gw security back in July.  Their DVR has no instructions on how to view the system on your mobile phone.  I have asked them numerous times for information by phone and by email yet they have yet to respond.  Overall I think they system is pretty good but I can't get in touch with anyone from GW for information on how to view it on my phone.  My item has since been removed from Amazon.
